snippet.title: SYNCED: Off-Planet | Official GeForce RTX Ray Tracing Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
See the world premiere of SYNCED: Off-Planet with ray tracing from Gamescom 2019.

Set in a future where humanity’s mechanical and technological evolution went violently wrong, players compete against other survivors of the apocalypse to secure resources for their day-to-day survival, and for a chance to escape planet Earth.

For the PC release of SYNCED: Off-Planet, we’ve partnered with Tencent Next Studios to bring realistic, immersive real-time ray-traced shadows and reflections to the game’s world. 

Learn more about ray tracing in SYNCED: Off-Planet: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/synced-off-planet-ray-tracing-trailer-screenshots-announcement

Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g?sub_confirmation=1

GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce
GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/
GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/

#SyncedOffPlanet
#RTXOn
#Gamescom2019
